Room.Name: Stairway of the Nobles
Room.LongDescription: This is the stairway used by the castle's nobility. Prince Rutger occasionally joins his friends who reside on the third level and comes down this way, but he generally descends the east stairway which is reserved for the royal family. Immediately to the south you can see the Grand Assembly. On the east side, you see the room where the fallen may rescind their pledge to Prince Rutger.
